/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their facades painted in hues of beige and brown, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The sky above is a clear blue, offering a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the city scene. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the architectural details of the buildings and the vibrancy of the city.
